title: Week 4 of IFF's Annual Membership Drive is here!
selftext:
New week, new perk 🥁

IFF Membership Drive week 4 is here! We’re excited to announce that the first 25 people to sign up as a Freedom Member or a higher tier between Sept 4 & Sept 9 will receive a signed copy of Aakar Patel's The Anarchist Cookbook!

[https://internetfreedom.in/donate/](https://internetfreedom.in/donate/)

A heartfelt THANK YOU to all our new members who have signed up so far! 💗But we've got a long way to go. IFF’s efforts to defend digital rights are fueled by YOU. We seek your support. Join us, become a member or donate now 👇

[https://internetfreedom.in/donate/](https://internetfreedom.in/donate/)

https://preview.redd.it/1kc2seuzs6mb1.png?width=1600&format=png&auto=webp&s=1b33575332228ed3cd2dedc171838d37e35b9241
